entry.title: Endemic Covid-19 Has Arrived in Portugal. This Is What It Looks Like.
entry.content: The country has one of the world’s highest coronavirus vaccination rates. Its cautious return to normality is being closely watched by other countries as their inoculations inch higher.

entry.title: Facebook Apps Are Used to Spread Hate in India, Documents Show
entry.content: Company researchers identified calls to violence that coincided with the 2020 riots in Delhi that left 53 dead.

entry.title: A 12-Year-Old Girl Sparks Debate on Covid-19 Vaccines for Kids in Mexico
entry.content: Zulma Gonzalez’s widely watched video challenging Mexico’s coronavirus czar pushed Mexico to vaccinate up to 1 million at-risk minors.
